pageProps.data:
## Threshold

###### Description

Applyes a threshold to the input image,
 threshold will be applied to the given channel.

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The source to be thresholded.|
|**threshold**|<var>number</var>|Value to be applied|
|**channel**|<var>number</var>|Channel to be applied|

###### Example

```js
gm.threshold(inputImage, 0.5);
```
